cause.description:
Please visit http://www.spokemantour.com/ to make a donation!! Do not donate through Facebook as it will go to the US then. Thanks!
Tim will be raising money for the Childhood Cancer Foundation of Canada, who are dedicated to improving the quality of life for children with cancer and their families.
1. Funds are required to find a cure!!
cause.mission: To help Tim Harriman on his Spokeman tour!
cause.name: THE SPOKEMAN TOUR FOR THE CHILDHOOD CANCER FOUNDATION CANDLELIGHTERS CANADA
